verses.verse: And it came to pass the same year<WH8141>, in the beginning<WH7225> of the reign<WH4467> of Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, in the fourth<WH7243> year<WH8141>, and in the fifth<WH2549> month<WH2320>, that Hananiah<WH2608> the son<WH1121> of Azur<WH5809> the prophet<WH5030>, which was of Gibeon<WH1391>, spoke<WH559> unto me in the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068>, in the presence<WH5869> of the priests<WH3548> and of all the people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>,
Thus speaks<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, I have broken<WH7665> the yoke<WH5923> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>.

Inside two full<WH3117> years<WH8141> will I bring again<WH7725> into this place<WH4725> all the vessels<WH3627> of the Lord<WH3068>'s house<WH1004>, that Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> took away<WH3947> from this place<WH4725>, and carried<WH935> them to Babylon<WH894>:

And I will bring again<WH7725> to this place<WH4725> Jeconiah<WH3204> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, with all the captives<WH1546> of Judah<WH3063>, that went<WH935> into Babylon<WH894>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>: for I will break<WH7665> the yoke<WH5923> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>.

Then the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414> said<WH559> unto the prophet<WH5030> Hananiah<WH2608> in the presence<WH5869> of the priests<WH3548>, and in the presence<WH5869> of all the people<WH5971> that stood<WH5975> in the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068>,

Even the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414> said<WH559>, Amen<WH543>: the Lord<WH3068> do<WH6213> so<WH3068>: the Lord perform<WH6965> your words<WH1697> which you have prophesied<WH5012>, to bring again<WH7725> the vessels<WH3627> of the Lord<WH3068>'s house<WH1004>, and all that is carried away captive<WH1473>, from Babylon<WH894> into this place<WH4725>.
Nevertheless hear<WH8085> you now this word<WH1697> that I speak<WH1696> in your ears<WH241>, and in the ears<WH241> of all the people<WH5971>;

The prophets<WH5030> that have been before<WH6440> me and before<WH6440> you of old<WH5769> prophesied<WH5012> both against many<WH7227> countries<WH776>, and against great<WH1419> kingdoms<WH4467>, of war<WH4421>, and of evil<WH7451>, and of pestilence<WH1698>.

The prophet<WH5030> which prophesies<WH5012> of peace<WH7965>, when the word<WH1697> of the prophet<WH5030> shall come to pass<WH935>, then<WH227> shall the prophet<WH5030> be known<WH3045>, that the Lord<WH3068> has truly<WH571> sent him<WH7971>.
Then Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet<WH5030> took<WH3947> the yoke<WH4133> from off the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414>'s neck<WH6677>, and broke it<WH7665>.

And Hananiah<WH2608> spoke<WH559> in the presence<WH5869> of all the people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>, Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>; Even so will I break<WH7665> the yoke<WH5923> of Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> from the neck<WH6677> of all nations<WH1471> inside the space of two full<WH3117> years<WH8141>. And the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414> went<WH3212> his way<WH1870>.

Then the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came unto Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH310>, after that Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet<WH5030> had broken<WH7665> the yoke<WH4133> from off the neck<WH6677> of the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414>, saying<WH559>,

Go<WH1980> and tell<WH559> Hananiah<WH2608>, saying<WH559>, Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>; You have broken<WH7665> the yokes<WH4133> of wood<WH6086>; but you shall make<WH6213> for them yokes<WH4133> of iron<WH1270>.

For thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; I have put<WH5414> a yoke<WH5923> of iron<WH1270> upon the neck<WH6677> of all these nations<WH1471>, that they may serve<WH5647> Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>; and they shall serve<WH5647> him<WH5414>: and I have given him the animals<WH2416> of the field also<WH7704>.

Then said<WH559> the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah<WH3414> unto Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet<WH5030>, Hear<WH8085> now<WH2608>, Hananiah; The Lord<WH3068> has not sent<WH7971> you<WH5971>; but you make this people to trust<WH982> in a lie<WH8267>.

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>; Behold<WH7971>, I will cast you from off the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>: this year<WH8141> you shall die<WH4191>, because you have taught<WH1696> rebellion<WH5627> against the Lord<WH3068>.
So Hananiah<WH2608> the prophet<WH5030> died<WH4191> the same year<WH8141> in the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320>.
